name: De-Hacked Frederickson Micro-kinetic Sleeves
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** Hack the sleeves with a hacker tool in order to make the clan version of the omni sleeves. Neutrals can not wear them. No trade skills required and the QL of the hacker tool does not matter. *** #L "Frederickson Micro-kinetic Sleeves" "152710" #L "Advanced Hacker Tool" "87814" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Frederickson Micro-kinetic Sleeves + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "De-Hacked Frederickson Micro-kinetic Sleeves" "286303" Skills: No skills required.
